EARS.description: Enable Asynchronous Request in Stop Register

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLNO.description: TCD Minor Byte Count (Minor Loop Mapping Disabled)

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLOFFNO.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Mapping Enabled and Offset Disabled)

TCD%s_NBYTES_MLOFFYES.description: TCD Signed Minor Loop Offset (Minor Loop Mapping and Offset Enabled)

TCD%s_CITER_ELINKNO.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

TCD%s_CITER_ELINKYES.description: TCD Current Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

TCD%s_DLASTSGA.description: TCD Last Destination Address Adjustment/Scatter Gather Address

TCD%s_BITER_ELINKNO.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Disabled)

TCD%s_BITER_ELINKYES.description: TCD Beginning Minor Loop Link, Major Loop Count (Channel Linking Enabled)

ERRCHN.description: Error Channel Number or Canceled Channel Number

VLD.description: Logical OR of all ERR status bits

SAST.description: Set All START Bits (activates all channels)

EDREQ_0.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 0.

EDREQ_1.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 1.

EDREQ_2.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 2.

EDREQ_3.description: Enable asynchronous DMA request in stop mode for channel 3.

MLOFF.description: If SMLOE or DMLOE is set, this field represents a sign-extended offset applied to the source or destination address to form the next-state value after the minor loop completes.

ELINK.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete
Enable channel-to-channel linking on minor-loop complete

DLASTSGA.description: Destination last address adjustment or the memory address for the next transfer control descriptor to be loaded into this channel (scatter/gather)

INTMAJOR.description: Enable an interrupt when major iteration count completes.

INTHALF.description: Enable an interrupt when major counter is half complete.

MAJORELINK.description: Enable channel-to-channel linking on major loop complete

ELINK.description: Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete
Enables channel-to-channel linking on minor loop complete

SCR1C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 1 Count Register

SCR1L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 1 Limit Register

SCR2C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 2 Count Register

SCR2L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 2 Limit Register

SCR3C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 3 Count Register

SCR3L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 3 Limit Register

SCR4C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 4 Count Register

SCR4L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 4 Limit Register

SCR5C.description: Statistical Check Run Length 5 Count Register

SCR5L.description: Statistical Check Run Length 5 Limit Register

SCR6PC.description: Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Count Register

SCR6PL.description: Statistical Check Run Length 6+ Limit Register

PKRCNT10.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 1 and 0 Register

PKRCNT32.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 3 and 2 Register

PKRCNT54.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 5 and 4 Register

PKRCNT76.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 7 and 6 Register

PKRCNT98.description: Statistical Check Poker Count 9 and 8 Register

PKRCNTBA.description: Statistical Check Poker Count B and A Register

PKRCNTDC.description: Statistical Check Poker Count D and C Register

PKRCNTFE.description: Statistical Check Poker Count F and E Register

UNUSED.description: This bit is unused but write-able. Must be left as zero.

FCT_VAL.description: Read only: Frequency Count Valid. Indicates that a valid frequency count may be read from FRQCNT.

TST_OUT.description: Read only: Test point inside ring oscillator.

TF1BR0.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF1BR0=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF1BR1.description: Test Fail, 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF1BR1=1, the 1-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF2BR0.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF2BR0=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF2BR1.description: Test Fail, 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF2BR1=1, the 2-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF3BR0.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF3BR0=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF3BR1.description: Test Fail, 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF3BR1=1, the 3-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF4BR0.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF4BR0=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF4BR1.description: Test Fail, 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF4BR1=1, the 4-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF5BR0.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s. If TF5BR0=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 0s Test has failed.

TF5BR1.description: Test Fail, 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s. If TF5BR1=1, the 5-Bit Run, Sampling 1s Test has failed.

TF6PBR0.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 0s

TF6PBR1.description: Test Fail, 6 Plus Bit Run, Sampling 1s

TFSB.description: Test Fail, Sparse Bit. If TFSB=1, the Sparse Bit Test has failed.

TFLR.description: Test Fail, Long Run. If TFLR=1, the Long Run Test has failed.

TFP.description: Test Fail, Poker. If TFP=1, the Poker Test has failed.

TFMB.description: Test Fail, Mono Bit. If TFMB=1, the Mono Bit Test has failed.

SH0.description: Reserved. DRNG specific, not applicable to this version.

NO_PRGM.description: If set, the TRNG registers cannot be programmed

SK_VAL.description: Reserved. DRNG-specific, not applicable to this version.

HW_ERR.description: Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted.
Bit position that can be cleared if corresponding bit of INT_STATUS has been asserted.

MIN_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Minor revision of the TRNG.

MAJ_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Major revision of the TRNG.

CONFIG_OPT.description: Shows the Freescale IP's Configuaration options for the TRNG.

ECO_REV.description: Shows the Freescale IP's ECO revision of the TRNG.

INTG_OPT.description: Shows the Freescale integration options for the TRNG.

ERA.description: Shows the Freescale compile options for the TRNG.

CTAR%s.description: Clock and Transfer Attributes Register (In Master Mode)

CTAR_SLAVE.description: Clock and Transfer Attributes Register (In Slave Mode)

RSER.description: DMA/Interrupt Request Select and Enable Register

PUSHR.description: PUSH TX FIFO Register In Master Mode

PUSHR_SLAVE.description: PUSH TX FIFO Register In Slave Mode

PCSIS.description: Peripheral Chip Select x Inactive State

RFDF_DIRS.description: Receive FIFO Drain DMA or Interrupt Request Select

TFFF_DIRS.description: Transmit FIFO Fill DMA or Interrupt Request Select

PCS.description: Select which PCS signals are to be asserted for the transfer

CLPD.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLPS.description: ADC Plus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLMS.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM2.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM1.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

CLM0.description: ADC Minus-Side General Calibration Value Register

DACBFRPBF.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Bottom Position Flag

DACBFRPTF.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Top Position Flag

DACBBIEN.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Bottom Flag Interrupt Enable

DACBTIEN.description: DAC Buffer Read Pointer Top Flag Interrupt Enable

GENCS.description: TSI General Control and Status Register

MODE.description: TSI analog modes setup and status bits.

TPM1CH0SRC.description: TPM1 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

TPM2CH0SRC.description: TPM2 Channel 0 Input Capture Source Select

MAXADDR1.description: This field concatenated with leading zeros plus the value of the MAXADDR1 field indicates the first invalid address of the second program flash block (flash block 1)

RXEDGIE.description: RX Input Active Edge Interrupt Enable

RXEDGIF.description: LPUART_RX Pin Active Edge Interrupt Flag

TXDIR.description: LPUART_TX Pin Direction in Single-Wire Mode

R0T0.description: Read receive data buffer 0 or write transmit data buffer 0.

R1T1.description: Read receive data buffer 1 or write transmit data buffer 1.

R2T2.description: Read receive data buffer 2 or write transmit data buffer 2.

R3T3.description: Read receive data buffer 3 or write transmit data buffer 3.

R4T4.description: Read receive data buffer 4 or write transmit data buffer 4.

R5T5.description: Read receive data buffer 5 or write transmit data buffer 5.

R6T6.description: Read receive data buffer 6 or write transmit data buffer 6.

R7T7.description: Read receive data buffer 7 or write transmit data buffer 7.

R8T8.description: Read receive data buffer 8 or write transmit data buffer 8.

R9T9.description: Read receive data buffer 9 or write transmit data buffer 9.

PARITYE.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with a parity error.

NOISY.description: The current received dataword contained in DATA[R9:R0] was received with noise.

ICV_TEST.description: ICV Checking / Test AES fault detection.

GEN_SLEEP.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Sleep Time

GEN_WAKE.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Wake Time

BLE_RF_OSC_REQ_INT_EN.description: BLE Ref Osc (Sysclk) Request Interrupt Enable

BLE_RF_OSC_REQ_INT.description: BLE Ref Osc (Sysclk) Request Interrupt Flag

RSIM_DSM_EXIT.description: BLE Force Deep Sleep Mode Exit

RF_OSC_READY_OVRD_EN.description: RF Ref Osc Ready Override Enable

BLOCK_SOC_RESETS.description: Block SoC Resets of the Radio

ALLOW_DFT_RESETS.description: Allow the DFT Reset Pin to Reset the Radio

DSM_ANT_READY.description: ANT Ready for Deep Sleep Mode

ANT_DEEP_SLEEP_STATUS.description: ANT Link Layer Deep Sleep Mode Status

ANT_SYSCLK_REQUEST_EN.description: Enable ANT Link Layer to Request RF OSC

ANT_SLEEP_REQUEST.description: ANT Link Layer Deep Sleep Requested

ANT_SYSCLK_REQ.description: ANT Link Layer RF OSC Request Status

ANT_SYSCLK_INTERRUPT_EN.description: ANT Link Layer RF OSC Request Interrupt Enable

ANT_SYSCLK_REQ_INT.description: Interrupt Flag from an ANT Link Layer RF OSC Request

DSM_GEN_READY.description: Generic FSK Ready for Deep Sleep Mode

GEN_DEEP_SLEEP_STATUS.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Deep Sleep Mode Status

DSM_GEN_FINISHED.description: Generic FSK Deep Sleep Time Finished

GEN_SYSCLK_REQUEST_EN.description: Enable Generic FSK Link Layer to Request RF OSC

GEN_SLEEP_REQUEST.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Deep Sleep Requested

GEN_SYSCLK_REQ.description: Generic FSK Link Layer RF OSC Request Status

GEN_SYSCLK_INTERRUPT_EN.description: Generic FSK Link Layer RF OSC Request Interrupt Enable

GEN_SYSCLK_REQ_INT.description: Interrupt Flag from an Generic FSK Link Layer RF OSC Request

ZIG_DEEP_SLEEP_STATUS.description: 802.15.4 Link Layer Deep Sleep Mode Status

ZIG_SYSCLK_REQUEST_EN.description: Enable 802.15.4 Link Layer to Request RF OSC

ZIG_SYSCLK_REQ.description: 802.15.4 Link Layer RF OSC Request Status

ZIG_SYSCLK_INTERRUPT_EN.description: 802.15.4 Link Layer RF OSC Request Interrupt Enable

ZIG_SYSCLK_REQ_INT.description: Interrupt Flag from an 802.15.4 Link Layer RF OSC Request

DSM_OSC_STABILIZE_TIME.description: Deep Sleep Wakeup RF OSC Stabilize Time

GEN_SLEEP_TIME.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Sleep Time

GEN_WAKE_TIME.description: Generic FSK Link Layer Wake Time

RADIO_EXT_OSC_RF_EN_SEL.description: Radio External Request for RF OSC Select

RADIO_EXT_OSC_OVRD.description: Radio External Request for RF OSC Override

RADIO_EXT_OSC_OVRD_EN.description: Radio External Request for RF OSC Override Enable

DCDC_DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH.description: Disable automatic clock switch from internal oscillator to external clock.

DCDC_SEL_CLK.description: Select external clock for DCDC when DCDC_DISABLE_AUTO_CLK_SWITCH is set.

DCDC_PWD_OSC_INT.description: Power down internal oscillator. Only set this bit when 32M crystal oscillator is available.

DCDC_LP_DF_CMP_ENABLE.description: Enable low power differential comparators, to sense lower supply in pulsed mode

DCDC_LP_STATE_HYS_L.description: Configure the hysteretic lower threshold value in low power mode

DCDC_LP_STATE_HYS_H.description: Configure the hysteretic upper threshold value in low power mode

HYST_LP_COMP_ADJ.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power comparator.

HYST_LP_CMP_DISABLE.description: Disable hysteresis in low power comparator.

OFFSET_RSNS_LP_ADJ.description: Adjust hysteretic value in low power voltage sense.

OFFSET_RSNS_LP_DISABLE.description: Disable hysteresis in low power voltage sense.

DCDC_LESS_I.description: Reduce DCDC current. It will save approximately 20 uA in RUN.

PSWITCH_STATUS.description: Status register to indicate PSWITCH status

VLPS_CONFIG_DCDC_HP.description: Selects behavior of DCDC in device VLPS low power mode

VLPR_VLPW_CONFIG_DCDC_HP.description: Selects behavior of DCDC in device VLPR and VLPW low power modes

DCDC_STS_DC_OK.description: Status register to indicate DCDC lock

POSLIMIT_BUCK_IN.description: Upper limit duty cycle limit in DC-DC converter

POSLIMIT_BOOST_IN.description: Upper limit duty cycle limit in DC-DC converter

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_CM_HST_THRESH.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_DF_HST_THRESH.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter differential mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_EN_CM_HYST.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter common mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_EN_DF_HYST.description: Enable hysteresis in switching converter differential mode analog comparators

DCDC_LOOPCTRL_HYST_SIGN.description: Invert the sign of the hysteresis in DC-DC analog comparators. This bit is set when in Pulsed mode.

DCDC_BATTMONITOR_EN_BATADJ.description: This bit enables the DC-DC to improve efficiency and minimize ripple using the information from the BATT_VAL field

DCDC_BATTMONITOR_BATT_VAL.description: Software should be configured to place the battery voltage in this register measured with an 8 mV LSB resolution through the ADC

DCDC_VDD1P8CTRL_TRG.description: Target value of VDD1P8, 25 mV each step in two ranges, from 0x00 to 0x11 and 0x20 to 0x3F.

DCDC_VDD1P5CTRL_TRG_BUCK.description: Target value of VDD1P5 in buck mode, 25 mV each step from 0x00 to 0x0F

DCDC_VDD1P5CTRL_TRG_BOOST.description: Target value of VDD1P5 in boost mode, 25 mV each step from 0x00 to 0x0F

DCDC_VDD1P5CTRL_ADJTN.description: Adjust value of duty cycle when switching between VDD1P5 and VDD1P8. The unit is 1/32 or 3.125%.

DCDC_MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK_PULSED.description: Set DCDC clock to half frequency for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DOUBLE_FETS_PULSED.description: Use double switch FET for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_HALF_FETS_PULSED.description: Use half switch FET for the Pulsed mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DC_HALFCLK.description: Set DCDC clock to half frequency for the continuous mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_DOUBLE_FETS.description: Use double switch FET for the continuous mode.

DCDC_MINPWR_HALF_FETS.description: Use half switch FET for the continuous mode.

DCDC_VDD1P5CTRL_DISABLE_STEP.description: Disable stepping for VDD1P5. Must set this bit before enter low power modes.

DCDC_VDD1P8CTRL_DISABLE_STEP.description: Disable stepping for VDD1P8. Must set this bit before enter low power modes.

DCDC_SW_SHUTDOWN.description: Shut down DCDC in buck mode. DCDC can be turned on by pulling PSWITCH to high momentarily (min 50 ms).DCDC_SW_SHUTDOWN should not be used in boost mode because when user write this bit, MCU won't be POR and enters an abnormal state.

UNLOCK.description: 0x3E77 KEY-Key needed to unlock HW_POWER_RESET register

PSWITCH_INT_RISE_EN.description: Enable rising edge detect for interrupt.

PSWITCH_INT_FALL_EN.description: Enable falling edge detect for interrupt.

PSWITCH_INT_CLEAR.description: Write 1 to clear interrupt. Set to 0 after clear.

PSWITCH_INT_MUTE.description: Mask interrupt to SoC, edge detection result can be read from PSIWTCH_INT_STS.

INTEGRATOR_VALUE.description: Integrator value which can be loaded in pulsed mode

INTEGRATOR_VALUE_SEL.description: Select the integrator value from above register or saved value in hardware.

CCA_ED_LQI_CTRL_0.description: RX_DIG CCA ED LQI Control Register 0

CCA_ED_LQI_CTRL_1.description: RX_DIG CCA ED LQI Control Register 1

CCA_ED_LQI_STAT_0.description: RX_DIG CCA ED LQI Status Register 0

RX_RSSI_FILT_HAZARD.description: Decimator output for RSSI, hazard condition detected

RX_DEC_FILT_SAT_Q.description: Decimator output, saturation detected for Q channel

DCOC_TRK_MIN_AGC_IDX.description: DCOC Tracking Minimum AGC Table Index

IQMC_DC_GAIN_ADJ.description: IQ Mismatch Correction DC Gain Coeff

DC_RESID_MIN_AGC_IDX.description: DC Residual Minimum AGC Table Index

DAC_CAL_ADJUST_MANUAL.description: Aux PLL Frequency DAC Calibration Adjust Manual value

FCAL_RUN_CNT.description: Aux PLL Frequency Calibration Run Count

FCAL_SMP_DLY.description: Aux PLL Frequency Calibration Sample Delay

DAC_CAL_ADJUST.description: Aux PLL DAC Calibration Adjust value

FCAL_BESTDIFF.description: Aux PLL Frequency Calibration Best Difference

TX_CAPTURE_POL.description: Polarity of the Input Data for the Transmitter

GFSK_MULTIPLY_TABLE_MANUAL.description: Manual GFSK Multiply Lookup Table Value

FSK_MODULATION_SCALE_0.description: FSK Modulation Scale for a data 0

RAW_MODE_Q.description: DTEST Raw Mode Enable for Q Channel

ASC.description: Each bit in the ASC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the crossbar switch's slave input port.

AMC.description: Each bit in the AMC field indicates whether there is a corresponding connection to the AXBS master input port.
